verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w luxuriant|strong="H1238"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w He|strong="H3478"\w* bore \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* lavishly. \w In|strong="H3478"\w* proportion \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3190"\w* \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w he|strong="H3478"\w* \w increased|strong="H7235"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* idols. \w In|strong="H3478"\w* proportion \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3190"\w* beauty \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* land \w he|strong="H3478"\w* \w made|strong="H7235"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H3190"\w* sacred \w pillars|strong="H4676"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H7703"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* false, \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w* must \w be|strong="H3820"\w* punished. God \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w break|strong="H6202"\w* \w the|strong="H6258"\w* necks \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w their|strong="H7703"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7703"\w* \w their|strong="H7703"\w* sacred \w pillars|strong="H4676"\w*.

\w Yes|strong="H3588"\w*, \w soon|strong="H6258"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* saying, “\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w revered|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w could|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w* anyway?”

\w Speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, perjuring \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w*, \w making|strong="H3772"\w* agreements, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* litigation springs \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w poisonous|strong="H7219"\w* weed \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* plowed \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H7934"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* tremble \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w fear|strong="H1481"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w calf|strong="H5697"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w Beth-aven|strong="H1007"\w*. \w Its|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5921"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w priests|strong="H3649"\w*, \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H1523"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w departed|strong="H1540"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w It|strong="H3947"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w carried|strong="H2986"\w* \w off|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Assyria \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* patron \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. Disgrace \w will|strong="H4428"\w* Ephraim bear \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* ashamed \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w its|strong="H3947"\w* \w idol|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w As|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* disappear, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w foam|strong="H7110"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* Aven \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* shrines \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*’s \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w thistles|strong="H1863"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w grow|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, “\w Cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*,” \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, “\w Fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.” What a nation sows, it will reap

\w From|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*. \w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w took|strong="H5975"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*. \w Will|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wicked?

\w When|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* please, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w punish|strong="H3256"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Nations|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* gather \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* chain \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w double|strong="H8147"\w* crimes.

Ephraim \w indeed|strong="H2790"\w* \w was|strong="H3063"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w trained|strong="H3925"\w* \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w* \w that|strong="H3063"\w* loved \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w thresh|strong="H1758"\w* grain, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* myself \w laid|strong="H5674"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* yoke \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w fair|strong="H2898"\w* \w neck|strong="H6676"\w*\f + \fr 10.11 \ft Heb. uncertain.\f*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H5674"\w* Ephraim draw \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* must \w plow|strong="H2790"\w*, \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* must \w turn|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* soil \w for|strong="H5921"\w* himself.

\w Sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fruits \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w love|strong="H2617"\w*. \w Break|strong="H5214"\w* \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w fallow|strong="H5215"\w* \w ground|strong="H5215"\w*, \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w so|strong="H3384"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* come \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*\f + \fr 10.12 \ft Heb. uncertain\f*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w plowed|strong="H2790"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*, \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w reaped|strong="H7114"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* eaten \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w lies|strong="H3585"\w*. \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* trusted \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* own \w path|strong="H1870"\w*\f + \fr 10.13 \ft LXX: chariots\f*, \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w warriors|strong="H1368"\w*,

\w Thus|strong="H3602"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* enormity \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*. \w When|strong="H6213"\w* \w dawn|strong="H7837"\w* breaks, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* broken.
